name: vDSP.FFT2D
desc: A 2D single- and double-precision fast Fourier transform.

items.name: init?(width: Int, height: Int, ofType: T.Type)
items.desc: Initializes a new fast Fourier transform instance for 2D FFT.

items.name: func transform<T>(input: T, output: inout T, direction: vDSP.FourierTransformDirection)
items.desc: Computes an out-of-place 2D fast Fourier transform.

declaration: class FFT2D<T> : vDSP.FFT<T> where T : vDSP_FourierTransformable
